input_text:
Job Title: Entry-Level Direct Marketing and Communications Events Coordinator

Location: Miami, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Business Development, Marketing

Description:
Are you a recent graduate or about to graduate with a passion for marketing and event planning? Are you looking to kickstart your career in a dynamic and collaborative environment? Join our team as an Entry-Level Direct Marketing and Communications Events Coordinator and gain hands-on experience in executing impactful marketing campaigns and events.
Just as the Roman empire was built by the many, Domino Marketing Agency Team embodies those values. We learn together, grow together, and succeed together! Our team is dedicated to creating the best environment, through our(and your) focus and determination, we are confident that we can meet client demands, anywhere we go!
Our aim is to enhance our team by finding fresh individuals that collectively will help us to achieve our goals. Currently, we are looking for individuals with a variety of characteristics including Ambition, Dedication, Outgoing and friendly personality, Competitive nature, and a great Sense of Humor. Traveling is more fun if you enjoy the people that you are traveling with!
Company Overview:We are a company dedicated to providing the best solutions to our clients in a way that is systematic and fast. Our team is committed to delivering exceptional services while fostering a culture of growth and development for our employees.
Position Overview:As an Entry-Level Direct Marketing and Communications Events Coordinator, you will work closely with our marketing team to support the planning and execution of direct marketing campaigns and communication events. This role offers a fantastic opportunity to learn and grow in the field of marketing and events management.
Key Responsibilities:Assist in the development and implementation of direct marketing strategies to promote our services.Support the coordination of communication events including webinars, seminars, and industry conferences.Assist with event logistics such as venue selection, vendor coordination, and attendee registration.Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment of marketing efforts and event objectives.Develop meaningful communication skills to represent clients wellCreate meaningful customer interactions in daily event settingsPractice and refine skillsets in daily training atmospheresProvide outstanding customer service for new customers, assuring long term relationships Continue developing leadership skills by engaging in networking calls and training
Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.Strong interest in marketing, with a desire to learn and grow in the industry.Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.Competitive and Goal drivenDetail-oriented with strong organizational and multitasking abilities.Enthusiastic team player with a proactive approach to problem-solving.

Benefits:Competitive entry-level salary with opportunities for advancement.Comprehensive training and mentorship from experienced professionals.Exposure to diverse marketing and event management projects.Potential for career growth within the company.Traveling- what a better way to learn? Fun and growth!!Rewards and activities throughout Miami
Asap Opportunities!! DONâ€™T MISS OUT!!
CHECK OUR WEBSITE: dmarketinggroup.co

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Assist with event logistics such as venue selection, vendor coordination, and attendee registration
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment of marketing efforts and event objectives

Create meaningful customer interactions in daily event settings
Practice and refine skillsets in daily training atmospheres
Provide outstanding customer service for new customers, assuring long term relationships
Continue developing leadership skills by engaging in networking calls and training

Exposure to diverse marketing and event management projects
Potential for career growth within the company
